messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] single moms
messages.msgSnippet: on 7/3/02 09:20, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... Regina, I admire your attitude.  This is one of those things that just burns me up. We (as a
messages.messageBody:
on 7/3/02 09:20, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Everyone seems to tell me at one time or another how much 'easier' my
> life would be if they were both in school....I really annoy them when I tell
> them that life...or parenting isn't supposed to be easy...

Regina,

I admire your attitude. This is one of those things that just burns me up.
We (as a society) no longer seem to think about what would be best for our
children, only what would be easy for us. School is easy, so school is
good. Just keep on marching to your own drummer, and forget about the pied
piper the rest of the world is listening to!

brenda
